measured_by: proportional dwell time and proportional fixations via SMI RED-250 eyetracker
justification: “The eye gaze of each participant was monitored throughout the experiment using the SMI eyetracker… We calculated the proportional dwell time… and the proportional fixations… as two primary measures of visual attention.”

measured_by: cursor dwell time tracked with BubbleView technique
justification: “Participants were required to use their cursor to reveal the underlying content via a fovea-like circular area around the mouse (similar to the BubbleView technique)… The location of the cursor was tracked as a proxy for visual attention.”

measured_by: absolute error between recalled and actual prices in a surprise memory test
justification: “Immediately after placing their order, participants were given a surprise memory test… To measure recall, we calculated the average absolute error between the recalled prices… and the actual prices for each participant.”

measured_by: absolute error between recalled and actual calories in a surprise memory test
justification: “Participants were… asked to recall its price and calorie information… To measure recall, we calculated the average absolute error between the recalled… calories and the actual calories for each participant.”
